Package domain.stores.Customer

Class Store

java.lang.Object
domain.stores.Customer.Store
public class Store extends Object
Store represents a data store for Customer objects.
Author:
Brandon Epperson

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Store(SQL db)
    Creates a new Store to retrieve Customer documents from the database.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add(Customer customer)
      add adds a new customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add

    • update

      public boolean update(Customer customer)
      update updates a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to update

    • delete

      public boolean delete(int id)
      delete attempts to delete a customer from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the customer to delete
      Returns:
      true if the query was successful

    • getById

      public Customer getById(int id)
      Queries the database for a user based on their customer_id. If no customer is found it returns an empty Customer object.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer_id to search for.
      Returns:
      the customer object

    • getByName

      public Customer getByName(String name)
      Queries the database for a user based on their customer_id. If no customer is found it returns an empty Customer object.
      Parameters:
      name - the customer_name to search for.
      Returns:
      the customer object

    • getAll

      public List<Customer> getAll()
      getAll attempts to fetch all customers contained in the database. Uses a lambda to scan each row and populate the list.
      Returns:
      a list of all customers

    • count

      public int count()
      count returns the number of rows contained in the customers table in the database.

    • maxId

      public int maxId()
      maxId returns the largest number in the customer Id column

    • getAllCustomerViews

      public List<CustomerView> getAllCustomerViews()
      getAllCustomerViews attempts to retrieve all CustomerView information from the database.
      Returns:
      the list of returned CustomerView

    • getCustomerReport

      public List<CustomerReport> getCustomerReport()
      getCustomerReports fetches the number of customers per country
      Returns:
      the list of CustomerReport
